1.q: Which artists and shows do you offer?
1.a: PepeShows offers a wide range of disciplines: aerial acrobatics, Cyr wheel, juggling, dance, breakdance, fire arts, comedy, magic, hosting, walking acts, special acts and many more. Our network is active across Europe and constantly growing.

2.q: How does the booking process work?
2.a: You can use our booking assistant – it guides you step by step through the request and sends it directly to suitable artists. Or simply book a phone appointment with us for general questions and advice.

3.q: How much lead time do I need for a booking?
3.a: Depending on the show, we recommend a few weeks’ lead time. Many acts can also be booked at short notice. Best to inquire as early as possible so we can guarantee the best options.

4.a: Requirements vary by show – for example stage height and rigging for aerials or safety distances for fire acts. Light and sound systems can be booked optionally. We advise individually and can handle the entire technical setup if needed.

5.a: Yes! Theme, costume, duration and run-of-show can be tailored. We design every performance to fit your event.

6.a: Together with our artists we’ve agreed on a fair pricing base. Fees depend on the type of show, effort, travel and technical needs. Just go through the booking assistant – it will immediately give you a price range.

7.q: Do you offer flat rates or only custom quotes?
7.a: As a rule we create individual quotes because every event is unique. However, the booking assistant immediately provides a transparent price overview.

8.q: Are travel costs included in the price?
8.a: Yes, the booking assistant shows a total price including travel costs. There are no hidden fees.

9.q: What does your booking assistant do?
9.a: In just a few minutes you’ll be asked for all the key details of your event – and it’s even fun! At the end you’ll receive a suitable offer with a price overview.

10.q: Will I have a dedicated contact person?
10.a: Yes, you’ll be looked after by a dedicated contact throughout the entire process. We coordinate artists, tech and run-of-show for you.

11.q: Do you support larger events with multiple acts?
11.a: Absolutely! We handle the entire show planning – from selection and coordination to execution of multiple acts. You get a coherent event from a single source.

teaser.headline: Teaser
teaser.text: PepeShows stands for world-class artistry – modern, energetic and perfectly organized. From galas to corporate events and festivals: our shows transform spaces into magical experiences. From world champions to award-winning talents – the Pepe Collective brings together the best. Art becomes magic, and for a moment the everyday fades.

elevator.headline: Elevator pitch
elevator.text:
Since 2006, the Pepe Collective has stood for artistry that excites. With PepeShows, two friends joined forces to bring their craft to corporate stages – professional, uncomplicated and outstanding.

Our artists are among the world’s elite: a Cyr-wheel world champion, a seven-time juggling world champion, a BC One champion in breakdance and many more exceptional talents. Together we create shows that blend emotion and precision.

Whether a solo highlight after dinner, a 45-minute duo show or a full-evening variety performance like recently in Gütersloh: we stage events that last. We’ve already brought magic to the stage for brands like Porsche, Google, McDonald’s, AstraZeneca and festivals like Tollwood.

PepeShows makes artistry tangible – and lets audiences dream at the same time.

about.headline: About
about.text:
PepeShows – where artistry becomes magic.

Since 2006, the Pepe Collective has been synonymous with top-tier artistry. With PepeShows, Christoph Hermann and his team combine decades of experience to develop tailor-made show concepts for companies and events of all sizes.

Our philosophy: professional, uncomplicated, outstanding. We believe artistry is more than acrobatics. It moves, inspires and opens a window into another world. For a moment, the everyday disappears and art becomes magic.

Behind PepeShows are world champions and award-winning performers: a Cyr-wheel world champion, a seven-time juggling world champion, a BC One champion in breakdance – and many other international artists. Together we craft unique shows that unite energy, elegance and precision.

Our repertoire ranges from short solo acts and dynamic 45-minute duo shows to full-evening variety programs (e.g. a 5-hour variety for the city of Gütersloh). Everything is possible – from dinner highlights to festival performances, with a clear focus on corporate events.

For organizers we provide technical packages – sound, light and rider are flexible: the full technical rider as well as logos, header images, press photos and trailers can be found in the media material. PepeShows makes artistry tangible – and lets audiences dream.
